properties.headline: Flash Flood Watch issued February 4 at 11:14PM CST until February 6 at 3:00PM CST by NWS New Orleans LA
properties.description:
......FLASH FLOOD WATCH IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON
THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON...

.A slow moving frontal system will move through the region
through Thursday. Heavy rainfall at times may result in flooding
Wednesday afternoon through Thursday afternoon.

The Flash Flood Watch continues for

* portions of southeast Mississippi and southern Mississippi,
including the following areas, in southeast Mississippi,
Harrison. In southern Mississippi, Hancock and Jackson.

* from Wednesday afternoon through Thursday afternoon

* Rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches will be possible with
locally higher amounts.
properties.instruction:
A Flash Flood Watch means that conditions may develop that lead
to flash flooding. Flash flooding is a very dangerous situation.

You should monitor later forecasts and be prepared to take action
should Flash Flood Warnings be issued.

NWSheadline: FLASH FLOOD WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY AFTERNOON THROUGH THURSDAY AFTERNOON
